50019.name: A New Challenger...
50019.text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.

50074.name: Akali, the Rhino
50074.text: Rush Overkill: Draw a Rush minion from your deck. Give it +5/+5.
50074.flavorText: Most trolls only get to “AAAAHHH!” and don’t make it to the “kali” part.

50776.name: Amani War Bear
50776.flavorText: "I used to farm for hours! Now they just come in packs?"

50121.name: Arcanosaur
50121.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage to all other minions.

50397.name: Arena Fanatic
50397.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
50397.flavorText: Her fantasy Rumble league gives double points for dismemberment.

50403.name: Arena Patron
50403.flavorText: Everybody with a ticket get in here!

50411.name: Arena Treasure Chest
50411.flavorText: Yeah it's great, but did you see the Arena Treasure Arms?!

50283.name: Auchenai Phantasm
50283.text: Battlecry: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
50283.flavorText: “Okay kids did everyone remember to heal before we left?”

50466.name: Baited Arrow
50466.flavorText: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

50386.name: Banana Buffoon
50386.flavorText: You could say he has a certain appeal.

50393.name: Belligerent Gnome
50393.text: Taunt Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, gain +1 Attack.
50393.flavorText: Maybe don't put this one in your garden.

49853.name: Big Bad Voodoo
49853.text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."

50086.name: Blast Wave
50086.text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Overkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
50086.flavorText: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

50070.name: Blood Troll Sapper
50070.text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
50070.flavorText: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

50512.name: Bloodclaw
50512.flavorText: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

49838.name: Bloodsail Howler
49838.text: Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Pirate you control.
49838.flavorText: They saw their fate a closin' Aboard a pirate ship On deck: The Howlin' Hozen About to let one rip.

50471.name: Bloodscalp Strategist
50471.text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, Discover a spell.
50471.flavorText: “Shoot them in the face” is more of a tactic than a strategy.

49803.name: Bog Slosher
49803.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
49803.flavorText: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.

50374.name: Booty Bay Bookie
50374.flavorText: Also makes a great librarian. She's really good at fixing books!

50087.name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
50087.text: Battlecry: Draw 1-Cost minions from your deck until your hand is full.

50779.name: Cannon Barrage
50779.text: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each of your Pirates.
50779.flavorText: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

50774.name: Captain Hooktusk
50774.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Pirates from your deck. Give them Rush.

50391.name: Cheaty Anklebiter
50391.flavorText: Famed hunter of the deadly Achilliosaur.

51816.name: Crowd Roaster
51816.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 7 damage to an enemy minion.
51816.flavorText: Every major show has an opening act to warm up the crowd.

50443.name: Da Undatakah
50443.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle effects of 3 friendly minions that died this game.
50443.flavorText: First Deathrattle: Draw a card. Second: Draw 2 cards. Third: Throw Mon'kind off a steel cage and plummet sixteen feet through an announcer’s table.

50381.name: Daring Fire-Eater
50381.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2 more damage.
50381.flavorText: A few hours later he DESTROYED the arena bathrooms.

50991.name: Demonbolt
50991.text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
50991.flavorText: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

50040.name: Devastate
50040.text: Deal 4 damage to a damaged minion.

50493.name: Dozing Marksman
50493.flavorText: It's the sleeper of the set.

50602.name: Dragon Roar
50602.text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
50602.flavorText: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

50412.name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
50412.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.

50414.name: Drakkari Trickster
50414.text: Battlecry: Give each player a copy of a random card from their opponent's deck.

50120.name: Elemental Evocation
50120.text: The next Elemental you play this turn costs (2) less.

50049.name: Emberscale Drake
50049.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
50049.flavorText: The third little dragon made his armor out of adamantite.

50014.name: Farraki Battleaxe
50014.text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
50014.flavorText: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

50408.name: Firetree Witchdoctor
50408.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
50408.flavorText: If your tree is on fire - stop, drop, and troll.

50731.name: Former Champ
50731.flavorText: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

49985.name: Gonk, the Raptor
49985.text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
49985.flavorText: There’s a word for Zandalari druids who refuse to pledge loyalty to Gonk: “Delicious.”

50775.name: Gral, the Shark
50775.text: Battlecry: Eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
50775.flavorText: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

50539.name: Grave Horror
50539.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
50539.flavorText: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.

50009.name: Griftah
50009.text: Battlecry: Discover two cards. Give one to your opponent at random.
50009.flavorText: With Griftah in your deck, sometimes you start the game with The Coin!

50012.name: Grim Rally
50012.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.

50380.name: Gurubashi Chicken
50380.flavorText: “Ya hold it by da feet, mon. Den ya THROW.”

49847.name: Gurubashi Hypemon
49847.text: Battlecry: Discover a 1/1 copy of a Battlecry minion. It costs (1).
49847.flavorText: Throw your hands in the air! They cost (1).

50396.name: Gurubashi Offering
50396.text: At the start of your turn, destroy this and gain 8 Armor.
50396.flavorText: For a limited time, loa blessings are on a pray-one-get-two deal (on selected sacrifices only).

50454.name: Hakkar, the Soulflayer
50454.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Corrupted Blood into each player's deck.
50454.flavorText: ATTENTION: Do not enter any major city while infected with the Corrupted Blood!

50659.name: Halazzi, the Lynx
50659.text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with 1/1 Lynxes that have Rush.
50659.flavorText: Remember, you’re only as strong as your weakest lynx.

49049.name: Half-Time Scavenger
49049.flavorText: One player's trash is another's “Best In Slot”.

49802.name: Haunting Visions
49802.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
49802.flavorText: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

50608.name: Headhunter's Hatchet
50608.text: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain +1 Durability.

50054.name: Heavy Metal!
50054.text: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
50054.flavorText: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

50377.name: Helpless Hatchling
50377.text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (1).
50377.flavorText: It can’t be all that helpful. Not wif dose widdle wings!

50095.name: Hex Lord Malacrass
50095.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
50095.flavorText: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

50126.name: High Priest Thekal
50126.text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1 of your Hero's Health into Armor.
50126.flavorText: "…and then I beat him with 1 Health!"

50032.name: High Priestess Jeklik
50032.text: Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
50032.flavorText: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

50034.name: Hir'eek, the Bat
50034.text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.

50434.name: Ice Cream Peddler
50434.text: Battlecry: If you control a Frozen minion, gain 8 Armor.
50434.flavorText: I scream, you scream, we all scream when we see a Freeze Mage.

50022.name: Immortal Prelate
50022.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
50022.flavorText: She protec. She attac. But most importantly, she come bac.

49973.name: Ironhide Direhorn
49973.flavorText: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

50088.name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
50088.text: Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord. ( left!) (Ready!)
50088.flavorText: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

50369.name: Krag'wa, the Frog
50369.text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to your hand.
50369.flavorText: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

50550.name: Likkim
50550.text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.

50416.name: Linecracker
50416.flavorText: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

50042.name: Mark of the Loa
50042.text: Choose One - Give a minion +2/+4 and Taunt; or Summon two 3/2 Raptors.
50042.flavorText: Ah, yes. Mark. The mightiest Loa.

50421.name: Masked Contender
50421.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, cast a Secret from your deck.
50421.flavorText: Knew Mysterious Challenger back when he was a Mysterious Squire.

50071.name: Mass Hysteria
50071.text: Force each minion to attack another random minion.
50071.flavorText: Black Friday gets worse every year.

50212.name: Master's Call
50212.text: Discover a minion from your deck. If all 3 are Beasts, draw them all instead.

51136.name: Mojomaster Zihi
51136.text: Battlecry: Set each player to 5 Mana Crystals.
51136.flavorText: Sadly, she was still two credits short of her Witch Doctorate.

50430.name: Mosh'Ogg Announcer
50430.text: Enemies attacking this have a 50% chance to attack someone else.
50430.flavorText: One's play-by-play. The other is off-color.

50392.name: Mosh'Ogg Enforcer
50392.flavorText: Can’t break the rules if you can’t read ‘em.

50402.name: Murloc Tastyfin
50402.flavorText: He was destined for the soup. One way or another…

50459.name: Oondasta
50459.text: Rush Overkill: Summon a Beast from your hand.
50459.flavorText: Adorning devilsaurs with armor and feathers is a respected job in troll culture, although it has a high turnover rate.

50595.name: Overlord's Whip
50595.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
50595.flavorText: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

49990.name: Pounce
49990.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
49990.flavorText: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

49994.name: Predatory Instincts
49994.text: Draw a Beast from your deck. Double its Health.
49994.flavorText: Somebody’s been eating their funnel cakes.

50082.name: Princess Talanji
50082.text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that didn't start in your deck.
50082.flavorText: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

50084.name: Pyromaniac
50084.text: Whenever your Hero Power kills a minion, draw a card.

50395.name: Rabble Bouncer
50395.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.

50773.name: Raiding Party
50773.text: Draw 2 Pirates from your deck. Combo: And a weapon.
50773.flavorText: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

50547.name: Rain of Toads
50547.flavorText: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

50385.name: Regeneratin' Thug
50385.text: At the start of your turn, restore 2 Health to this minion.

51159.name: Revenge of the Wild
51159.text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.
51159.flavorText: My roommates only use Revenge of the Passive Aggressive.

50427.name: Rumbletusk Shaker
50427.flavorText: Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub. And who do you think dey be? Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah. And all of dem comin' for me.

50315.name: Sand Drudge
50315.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt.
50315.flavorText: Loves long walks on the beach, raising the dead, and chocolates.

50796.name: Saronite Taskmaster
50796.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Free Agent with Taunt for your opponent.
50796.flavorText: Don't even think of asking for time off.

49984.name: Savage Striker
49984.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to your hero's Attack.

50372.name: Scarab Egg
50372.flavorText: They say you can’t make an omelet without AHHH THEY’RE EATING MY FACE!

50122.name: Scorch
50122.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Costs (1) if you played an Elemental last turn.
50122.flavorText: The hoof. The hoof. The hoof is on fire.

50278.name: Seance
50278.text: Choose a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
50278.flavorText: “The spirits spoke to me.” "What did they say?" "You had lethal two turns ago."

49800.name: Serpent Ward
49800.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
49800.flavorText: When snakes get sick, they get sent to the Serpent Ward.

50383.name: Sharkfin Fan
50383.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate.
50383.flavorText: His taste in soup is criminal.

50410.name: Shieldbreaker
50410.flavorText: Can also break up fights, relationships, and unions.

49981.name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
49981.text: Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells.
49981.flavorText: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.

50002.name: Shriek
50002.text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal 2 damage to all minions.
50002.flavorText: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

50059.name: Smolderthorn Lancer
50059.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.

50437.name: Snapjaw Shellfighter
50437.text: Whenever an adjacent minion takes damage, this minion takes it instead.

50006.name: Soulwarden
50006.text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.

52931.name: Soup Vendor
52931.text: Whenever you restore 3 or more Health to your hero, draw a card.
52931.flavorText: Fresh from the floor of the arena!

50083.name: Spellzerker
50083.flavorText: But don’t ask her to use it in a sentence.

50025.name: Spirit of the Bat
50025.text: Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, give a minion in your hand +1/+1.
50025.flavorText: Nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah

50352.name: Spirit of the Dead
50352.text: Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, shuffle a 1-Cost copy of it into your deck.
50352.flavorText: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

50093.name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
50093.text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your Hero Power also targets adjacent minions.
50093.flavorText: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

49804.name: Spirit of the Frog
49804.text: Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you cast a spell, draw a spell from your deck that costs (1) more.

50660.name: Spirit of the Lynx
50660.text: Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +1/+1.
50660.flavorText: Much of this shrine’s power lies in the can-opener noise it makes.

49944.name: Spirit of the Raptor
49944.text: Stealth for 1 turn. After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
49944.flavorText: “Loti! LOTI! Drop it. Drop it Loti! Down! Down Loti!”

52242.name: Spirit of the Rhino
52242.text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
52242.flavorText: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

49972.name: Spirit of the Shark
49972.text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your minions' Battlecries and Combos trigger twice.
49972.flavorText: It has Stealth, but its ominous theme music keeps giving it away.

50031.name: Spirit of the Tiger
50031.text: Stealth for 1 turn. After you cast a spell, summon a Tiger with stats equal to its Cost.
50031.flavorText: Less of a cantrip and more of a cat-nip.

50230.name: Splitting Image
50230.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
50230.flavorText: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

49824.name: Springpaw
49824.text: Rush Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynx with Rush to your hand.
49824.flavorText: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!

50044.name: Stampeding Roar
50044.text: Summon a random Beast from your hand and give it Rush.
50044.flavorText: The Gurubashi Arena has an extremely permissive policy on pets in the workplace.

50056.name: Sul'thraze
50056.flavorText: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

50282.name: Surrender to Madness
50282.text: Destroy 3 of your Mana Crystals. Give all minions in your deck +2/+2.

50644.name: The Beast Within
50644.text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
50644.flavorText: Undoes years of obedience school training.

49066.name: Ticket Scalper
49066.flavorText: Takes ten percent off the top.

49999.name: Time Out!
49999.text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.

49051.name: Totemic Smash
49051.text: Deal 2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
49051.flavorText: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

50356.name: Treespeaker
50356.flavorText: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

50491.name: Untamed Beastmaster
50491.text: Whenever you draw a Beast, give it +2/+2.
50491.flavorText: All it takes is a tummy rub.

50004.name: Void Contract
50004.text: Destroy half of each player's deck.

50066.name: War Master Voone
50066.text: Battlecry: Copy all Dragons in your hand.
50066.flavorText: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

43310.name: Wardruid Loti
43310.text: Choose One - Transform into one of Loti's four dinosaur forms.
43310.flavorText: “Ravasaur!” “Pretty scary” “…Blammodax!” “Is that a thing?” “SMAXODON!” “….now you’re just making those up.”

50405.name: Wartbringer
50405.text: Battlecry: If you played 2 spells this turn, deal 2 damage.
50405.flavorText: “Does she cause them with magic, or just…like have a bucket she brings with her?”

50497.name: Waterboy
50497.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn costs (0).

50514.name: Zandalari Templar
50514.text: Battlecry: If you've restored 10 Health this game, gain +4/+4 and Taunt. ( left!) (Ready!)

49867.name: Zentimo
49867.text: Whenever you target a minion with a spell, cast it again on its neighbors.

49819.name: Zul'jin
49819.text: Battlecry: Cast all spells you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
49819.flavorText: If you can dodge an axe, you can dodge a ball.
